title: Bug 124610: Adding a filter on a boolean computed column causes an error
OB: When attempting to add a filter on a boolean computed column, an error occurs.
EB: Filters on boolean computed columns should be applied without causing errors; the system should handle this operation seamlessly.
SR:
1. Open the application and navigate to the data management section.
2. Choose a table with a boolean computed column.
3. Attempt to add a filter on the boolean computed column.
4. Observe the error that occurs during this operation.
